author: PTI
title: COVID-19: Congress delivers nearly $500 billion more in virus aid
description: Lawmakers’ face masks and bandanas added an sombre tone to their effort to aid a nation staggered by the health crisis and devastating economic costs of the coronavirus pandemic
content:
Congress has delivered a nearly $500 billion infusion of coronavirus spending, rushing new relief to employers and hospitals buckling under the strain of a pandemic that has claimed almost 50,000 American lives and one in six U.S. jobs.
 The measure passed a… [+5486 chars]
